meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the October 25, 2023 City Council Meeting
Authorize settlement of the lawsuit styled Shakur W. Stewart f/k/a Everold W. Stewart v. John Coughlin and the City of Dallas
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $900,000.00 - Financing: Liability Reserve Fund

agenda_items.title: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas, Equipment Acquisition Contractual Obligations, Series 2023BA
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $76,270,000; levying a tax for payment thereof.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to acquire, develop, and own Maple Highline
agenda_items.description: Estimated Revenue Foregone: General Fund $4,938,708.00 (75 Years of Estimated Property Taxes)

agenda_items.title: A resolution authorizing the conveyance of an easement and right of way to Oncor Electric Delivery Company, LLC
agenda_items.description: Financing: No cost consideration to the City

agenda_items.title: Authorize (1) the rejection of bids for a construction services contract for the Five Mile Infrastructure Improvements Package A
agenda_items.description: Financing: No cost consideration to the City

agenda_items.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the 2024 One-Year Term Agreement for Improved Alley Maintenance Program
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $2,793,048.00 - Financing: Street and Alley Improvement Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the 2024 Two-Year Term Agreement Slurry Seal and Polymer Modified Micro-Surfacing Contract
agenda_items.description: Not to exceed $17,604,618.00 - Financing: General Fund

agenda_items.title: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with The Fain Group, Inc.
An ordinance amending Chapter 28, 'Motor Vehicles and Traffic,' of the Dallas City Code
agenda_items.description: Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City
